Reviews.Title: Wasn't the best
Reviews.Author: Franklin E.
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet because I wanted to use if for personal use and for some side school work. I though that it was going to be amazing, it came in a every nice package and there where no dents and it turned on easily. I used if for about 2 week and then one morning it wouldn't turn on, so i contacted the seller and they are going to give me a refund. This tablet has a plastic back that can pop on and off every easily, so when you drop it it opens. I wouldn't give this to anyone as a gift.

ProductInfo.Features:
Operation System: Google Android 4.0.3 ICS
CPU:  VIA8850 Cortex-A9 1.2GHz + Mali400 GPU, 2D/3D graphics processor (Open GL ES 2.0 2D and 3D Hardware Acceleration for gaming).
RAM: DDR3 512M
Nand Flash: 4 GB. Supports up to 32 GB via build-in MicroSD /SDHC card slot. System space used around 2.2 GB
Screen: 7 inch 5-piont capacitance touchscreen 800 x 480 Pixels.
ProductInfo.Name: Gpad WM8850 Android 4.0.3 Tablet PC 7 inch Capacitive Screen VIA 8850 Cortex A9 4GB (White)
